title: Lonely Planet China Phrasebook & Dictionary (gnv64)
description:
Lonely Planet China Phrasebook & Dictionary (2nd Ed)
by Lonely Planet
Lonely Planet | October 2015 | ISBN-10: 1743214340 | PDF | 384 pages | 17.4 mb

Lonely Planet China Phrasebook & Dictionary is your handy passport to culturally enriching travels with the most relevant and useful phrases and vocabulary for all your travel needs. Get more from your multi-country trip with easy-to-find phrases for Mandarin, Cantonese, Chaozhou, Dongbei Hua, Hakka, Hunanese, Shanghainese, Sichuanese, Xi'an, Yunnan Hua, Zhuang, Mongolian, Tibetan, Uighur. With language tools in your back pocket, you can truly get to the heart of wherever you go, so begin your journey now!  

CONTENTS
tones
alphabet
introduction
pronunciation
language difficulties
time & dates
border crossing
tickets & luggage
transport directions
accommodation
banking & communications
sightseeing
shopping
meeting people
photography
making conversation
feelings & opinions
farewells
eating out
special diets & allergies
emergencies
health
dictionary
culture section 361
history timeline 362
food 366
festivals 370
index 374
